title: Strong-solid-bold display typeface.
content:
Hi!

Im looking for a typeface for a logo design. It can be serif, sans or slab serif. I'm looking for something bold, with a strong/solid feel. Preferably a little bit geometric looking.

Thank you!
author: Ju22

comments.content:
@Nick – I don’t think this brief _has_ ends. That said, an idea on what the logo is to market would be nice.

Hennyways and milwaukeeroads, why not start off with a heavy weight of Futura, oblique, just to throw something into the ring?
